sentences.en: a bow and arrow
sentences.cn: 弓箭

sentences.en: Add a length of ribbon tied in a bow.
sentences.cn: 再用一段丝带，系个蝴蝶结。

sentences.en: Corbett entered the room, bowing respectfully.
sentences.cn: 科比特走进房间，恭敬地鞠了一躬。

sentences.en: Ella wore a bow in her hair.
sentences.cn: 埃拉头发上扎着一个蝴蝶结。

sentences.en: Farling smiled in acknowledgement and gave a bow.
sentences.cn: 法林微笑示意，又躬身行了个礼。

sentences.en: He acknowledged the applause with a small bow.
sentences.cn: 他微微地鞠了一躬表示对掌声的感谢。

sentences.en: He drew the bow and shot an arrow.
sentences.cn: 他张弓射箭.

sentences.en: He refused to bow and scrape to every customer.
sentences.cn: 他不愿奉承每个顾客.

sentences.en: He was armed with a bow and arrow .
sentences.cn: 他佩带着弓箭。

sentences.en: I bow before your opinion, and will take your advice.
sentences.cn: 我同意你的意见, 并接受你的忠告.

sentences.en: I gave a theatrical bow and waved.
sentences.cn: 我夸张地鞠了个躬，然后挥手致意。

sentences.en: I untied the bow and unwrapped the small box.
sentences.cn: 我解开蝴蝶结，拆开小盒子的包装。

sentences.en: many artists are forced to &B{bow out of} the profession at a relatively early age.
sentences.cn: 许多艺术家在相当早的时候就被迫退出演艺圈。

sentences.en: She bowed and left the stage.
sentences.cn: 她鞠了一躬，离开了舞台。

sentences.en: supporters are firing a warning shot across the President's bows.
sentences.cn: 支持者们向总统发出警告。

sentences.en: The archer strung his bow and aimed an arrow at the target.
sentences.cn: 弓箭手拉紧弓弦将箭瞄准靶子.

sentences.en: The barge had a rounded bow and stern.
sentences.cn: 这艘驳船的两端都是圆形的。

sentences.en: the midfielder only made his England bow nine months ago.
sentences.cn: 这个中场队员九个月前首次在英国亮相。

sentences.en: The servant bowed low and handed his master the sealed note.
sentences.cn: 仆人深深一鞠躬，把那个封好的短笺递给了主人。

sentences.en: This is done with a formal bow to the king or queen.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，还要向国王或女王正式鞠躬行礼。

sentences.en: We can never bow the neck to any invaders of our country.
sentences.cn: 我们不能向入侵者屈服.

sentences.en: We cannot believe him because he used to draw the long bow.
sentences.cn: 他老是夸夸其谈,我们不能相信他.

sentences.en: We should not have to bow down to anyone.
sentences.cn: 我们不必向任何人示弱。

phrases.tran_cn: （意在恐吓某人使其改变行动步骤或方针的言语或姿态式的）警告

phrases.phrase: have (或 add) another string to one's bow
have many strings to one's bow

phrases.tran_cn: 初次在公众前露面；首次亮相

trans.tran_en: the act of bending the top part of your body forward to show respect for someone when you meet them, or as a way of thanking an  audience

trans.tran_cn: 鞠躬， 低头； 鞠躬， 低头
trans.tran_en: to bend the top part of your body forward in order to show respect for someone important, or as a way of thanking an  audience

trans.tran_cn: 鞠躬，低头，屈服于，使沮丧
trans.tran_en: to bend the top part of your body forward in order to show respect for someone important, or as a way of thanking an  audience
to bend the top part of your body forward in order to show respect for someone important, or as a way of thanking an  audience
to bend the top part of your body forward in order to show respect for someone important, or as a way of thanking an  audience
